content: निर्वृत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To cease, come to an end; <ls>Bk. 8. 69.</ls> {@--2@} To be got or accomplished; <ls>R. 17. 18</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 61.</ls> {@--3@} To be withheld, not to happen; <ls>Bk. 16. 6.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To perform; accomplish, finish, complete; आहारं निर्वर्तयामास <ls>K. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 45</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 33</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 30.</ls>
